preprocess_consensusNew module¶

preprocess_consensusNew.archive_consensus(year, month, date, hour)¶

Pulls relay info from consensus file helper for pickle_consensus

year : (str) ‘year’ month : (str) ‘mm’ date : (str) ‘dd’ hour : (str) ‘hr’

list of Relay objects, (int) wgd, (int), wgg

preprocess_consensusNew.coverage_dict(roas, ipv4s, ipv6s, make_pickle=False)¶

uses roa csv file downloaded from https://rpki-validator.ripe.net/roas if make_pickle = True, creates coveragev4.pickle and coveragev6.pickle to be used in update_consensus_pickle

preprocess_consensusNew.get_all_ips(start_date, end_date)¶
preprocess_consensusNew.get_pre_asn(ipv4s, ipv6s, make_pickle=False, existing_file=False)¶
preprocess_consensusNew.get_roas(filename)¶

get roas from csv file returns two lists of lists [ip, max length, prefix length]

preprocess_consensusNew.load_consensus(p, year, month, date, hour)¶

pulls relay data from pickled file

preprocess_consensusNew.main(args)¶
preprocess_consensusNew.parse_arguments(args)¶
preprocess_consensusNew.pickle_consensus(start_date, end_date, gen_all_ip_pickles=False)¶

creates .pickle for each consensus if gen_all_ip_pickles = True, creates all-ips.pickle for all ips b/t start and end date requires directory called archive_pickles to put consensus pickles in

preprocess_consensusNew.update_consensus_pickle(start_date, end_date, v4coverage, v6coverage, ipv4_asns, ipv6_asns)¶

updates allguards.pickle to contain ROA coverage
